item.title: 1 Error Compile I WILL PAY $12
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

Actually its

if (MyShopID != 8 && MyShopID != 19 && MyShopID !=1) { if (playerItemsN[Slot] >= TotPrice2) { if (freeSlots() > 0) { deleteItem(995, GetItemSlot(995), TotPrice2); addItem(itemID, 1); server.shopHandler.ShopItemsN[MyShopID][fromSlot] -= 1; server.shopHandler.ShopItemsDelay[MyShopID][fromSlot] = 0; if ((fromSlot + 1) > server.shopHandler.ShopItemsStandard[MyShopID]) { server.shopHandler.ShopItems[MyShopID][fromSlot] = 0; } } else { sM("Not enough space in your inventory."); break; } } else { sM("Not enough coins for this item."); } } if (MyShopID == 1) { if (pkPoints >= TotPrice2) { if (freeSlots() > 0){ pkPoints -= TotPrice2; addItem(itemID, 1); server.shopHandler.ShopItemsN[MyShopID][fromSlot] -= 1; server.shopHandler.ShopItemsDelay[MyShopID][fromSlot] = 0; if ((fromSlot + 1) > server.shopHandler.ShopItemsStandard[MyShopID]) { server.shopHandler.ShopItems[MyShopID][fromSlot] = 0; } } else { sM("Not enough space in your inventory."); break; } } else { sM("Not enough PK points for this item."); } }

Read full topic

item.title: 1 Error Compile I WILL PAY $12
item.dc:creator: @Please1 -Please
item.description:
@Please1 wrote:

This

                 if (MyShopID != 8 && MyShopID != 19 && MyShopID !=1) {
                if (playerItemsN[Slot] >= TotPrice2) {
                    if (freeSlots() > 0) {						
                        deleteItem(995, GetItemSlot(995), TotPrice2);
                        addItem(itemID, 1);
                        server.shopHandler.ShopItemsN[MyShopID][fromSlot] -= 1;
                        server.shopHandler.ShopItemsDelay[MyShopID][fromSlot] = 0;
                        if ((fromSlot + 1)
                                > server.shopHandler.ShopItemsStandard[MyShopID]) {
                            server.shopHandler.ShopItems[MyShopID][fromSlot] = 0;
                        }
                    } else {
                        sM("Not enough space in your inventory.");
                        break;
		if (MyShopID == 1) {
	    if (pkPoints >= TotPrice2) {
		if (freeSlots() > 0){
		   pkPoints -= TotPrice2;
                        addItem(itemID, 1);
                        server.shopHandler.ShopItemsN[MyShopID][fromSlot] -= 1;
                        server.shopHandler.ShopItemsDelay[MyShopID][fromSlot] = 0;
                        if ((fromSlot + 1)
                                > server.shopHandler.ShopItemsStandard[MyShopID]) {
                            server.shopHandler.ShopItems[MyShopID][fromSlot] = 0;
                        }
                    } else {
                        sM("Not enough space in your inventory.");
                        break;
                    }
                } else {
                    sM("Not enough PK points for this item.");
                }
        	}
                    }
                } else {
                    sM("Not enough coins for this item.");
                }
            }
